sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>hole</radical> radical and the <kanji>hole</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Spectacular!
readingMnemonic: <reading>Ana</reading> (<ja>あな</ja>) fell into a <kanji>hole</kanji>. Laugh at Ana and her unfortunate misfortune of having fallen into a hole like a ninny. Haha, Ana – you’re stupid and clumsy!
readingInfo: Imagine yourself laughing at Ana while you point at her, continuing to jeer as Ana struggles to escape the hole. You’d help Ana out of the hole, but you’re too busy laughing at her.
